list_users.üî¥_CRITICAL_CHANGE_2025_10_30: CONSOLIDATED ARCHITECTURE: venues and galleras tables ELIMINATED. All data now in User.profileInfo for users with role='venue' or role='gallera'
list_users.usage_for_venues: /users?role=venue ‚Üí Returns User[] with profileInfo.venueName, venueLocation, venueDescription, venueEmail, venueWebsite, venueImages (max 3)
list_users.usage_for_galleras: /users?role=gallera ‚Üí Returns User[] with profileInfo.galleraName, galleraLocation, galleraDescription, galleraEmail, galleraWebsite, galleraSpecialties, galleraActiveRoosters, galleraImages (max 3)
list_users.status_field_logic: Status is CALCULATED field, not stored. Derived from (User.isActive && User.approved): true+true='active', true+false='pending', false+true='inactive', false+false='rejected'. NO status filter in venues/galleras queries.
